inclusionPriority.title: Inclusion priority
inclusionPriority.description: Inclusion priority in relation to other autocomplete-plus providers

excludeLowerPriority.title: Exclude lower priority providers
excludeLowerPriority.description: Whether to exclude lower priority providers

loadClassMembers.title: Load class members
loadClassMembers.description: If enabled, you can examine class methods and other members e.g. 'ArrayList.contains'.  If you have enabled the 'load class members' setting, I recommend you to put the most important paths in the classpath first, because class descriptions are loaded in the order specified in the .classpath file. This feature is recommended only for small projects at the moment because current implementation is still unoptimized.
